item.title: Conductor dies as KKRTC bus topples near Devdurg
item.description: <![CDATA[Pic: A KKRTC bus lost control and flipped over while crossing a canal bridge close to Anjul village in Devdurg taluk of Raichur district on Tuesday morningDevdurg (Raichur): The conductor of a KKRTC bus was killed, and 23 passengers, including 19 students, seriously injured in an accident near Anchesugur in Devdurg taluk on Tuesday morning.The deceased is Basavaraj. According to police, the accident occurred when the bus, belonging to KKRTC Raichur depot, was travelling from Anjul village to Dev...]]>
item.author: Tnn
